content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 88-95)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-7.0, 3.5) (now operational with coal supply)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 3.5) (72% capacity utilization)
- Coal buffer system:
  - Wooden chest at (-7.5, 7.5) with coal supply
  - Burner inserter at (-6.5, 7.5) (active)

### Advanced Oil Processing Complex at position (17.5, 40.5)
Consists of:
- Pumpjack at (17.5, 40.5) (now powered)
- Refinery with advanced processing
- Storage tank network (2 active tanks)
- Chemical plant at (35.5, 42.5) with:
  - 4 recipe capabilities
  - Output capacity of 1,200/60s
  - Integrated cracking systems

### Northwest Oil Field Expansion at position (-50.5, 30.5)
Consists of:
- 2 new pumpjacks (1,200/60s capacity)
- 120 underground pipes
- 8 pumps
- Power infrastructure:
  - 8 medium electric poles
  - Connection to main grid

### Solar Array at position (50.5, -10.5)
Consists of:
- 20 solar panels (1,820 kW output)
- 10 accumulators
- 8 medium electric poles
- Circuit network (96% solar utilization)
- Expansion in progress (40% complete)

## ERROR TIPS

### Expansion Project Management
- Verify all foundation alignments before pumpjack installation
- Double-check pipe network pressure ratings before commissioning
- Confirm power grid capacity before connecting new equipment

### Quality Assurance Procedures
- Maintain purity testing protocols during expansion phases
- Document all quality metrics before system integration
- Establish baseline measurements for new equipment

### Safety Protocol Implementation
- Conduct daily safety briefings for construction crews
- Verify all emergency systems before equipment activation
- Maintain strict PPE compliance during expansion work

### Production Monitoring
- Establish transition protocols when integrating new capacity
- Monitor power grid stability during phased expansions
- Document all baseline performance metrics

### Resource Management
- Track material consumption against project milestones
- Maintain contingency reserves for critical components
- Verify delivery schedules match construction timelines

## NAMESPACE

### Defined Functions
1. `calculate_throughput(target: int, current: int) -> float`
   - Successfully used for expansion capacity validation
   - Extended to handle combined production metrics

2. `estimate_roi(cost: float, savings: float) -> float`
   - Applied to expansion project financial analysis
   - Now includes operational cost projections

3. `phase_progress(completed: int, total: int) -> float`
   - Enhanced with construction-specific tracking
   - Used for daily progress reporting

### Important Variables
- `combined_throughput: int = 1463` (units/60s)
- `expansion_phase: int = 1` (completed)
- `safety_violations: int = 0` (current period)
